name: Osmania University
description: Osmania University is one of the oldest and most prestigious universities in India, located in Hyderabad, Telangana. Established in 1918, the campus is well known for its grand Indo-Saracenic architecture, especially the iconic Arts College building. The vast green campus offers peaceful walking paths, historic structures, and a vibrant student atmosphere, making it a popular place for morning walks, photography, and heritage exploration.

name: Anantagiri Hills
description: A beautiful hill station perfect for nature lovers and adventure seekers. Known for its lush green forests, scenic viewpoints, and challenging trekking trails. The cool climate and fresh air make it an ideal destination for a weekend getaway.

name: Bhongir Fort
description: A historic fort with a dramatic conical hill rising 120 meters. Offers spectacular panoramic views of the surrounding landscape. Perfect for history buffs and adventure enthusiasts. The fort has remnants of old structures and offers a moderately challenging trek.
